phrs.translation: 拼错, 拼写错误, 拼错了
我拼错了那个词, 我把字串错

sentences.sentence: OK, is that OK now? Did I misspell other words?
sentences.translation: 现在好了吧？我还拼错了其他词了吗？

sentences.sentence: This is not just bad spelling, but a deliberate attempt to creatively misspell words.
sentences.translation: 而这些新词并不是拼写错误，而是刻意的，创造性的误拼。

sentences.sentence: When I misspell something, when I go on to Google, my shy, it will say, "Did you mean that..."
sentences.translation: 当我拼错词的时候，我上谷歌，有点儿害羞啊，它会说，“你的意思是不是。”
